job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate code and evaluating that code, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes human feedback for AI training, which aligns more with data annotation or quality assurance than core AI engineering roles.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'train AI models' directly relates to the process of developing and refining machine learning models, which is a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: help train generative artificial intelligence models
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the involvement in the training process of generative AI models, fitting the definition of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
job_tasks.justification: This describes a method of providing data or feedback that directly contributes to the training of AI models, falling under the Modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking model outputs is a form of feedback loop that informs model improvement and training, thus relating to the Modeling task.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This indicates that the role is open to individuals who may not have prior AI experience, suggesting an emphasis on learning and adapting to the AI domain.

soft_skills.phrase: lend your coding expertise to train AI models
soft_skills.justification: This implies using existing coding skills in a new context to contribute to AI model training, suggesting a proactive and ownership-oriented approach.
